name: Quickstart: Setup Firmware 2.0.0
description: Apply fresh firmware to a tag and prepare for deployment. Apply a configuration after completion.

commands.description: Apply new firmware. Switch tag to DFU mode using switch on the reverse then press reset button. Run command.
Apply the GPS almanac. Revert switch to SYS mode, pressing reset and waiting until both the orange and red LEDs are lit. Run command.
Update the clock to the current date and time.
Create a blank log on the tag.
Load default config to the tag
